meta.Title: PAGING MR. BULFINCH [New York Times, Sunday, November 5, 1950]
meta.Author: Thomas Meekin

across.question: He struck the Trojan Horse—and serpents destroyed him.
Artemis changed her into a stream.
Here, legend says, Pluto seized Proserpine.

down.question: Father of Daphne; god of a river diverted by Hercules.
He led the Greeks at Troy.
What Hercules made by diverting two rivers.
The Muse with staff and globe.
